# Basscss Color Base

<p class="hide">Base element color styles module for Basscss</p>

<a href="http://basscss.com" class="hide">basscss.com</a>

Sets color styles for the body tag, links, pre, code, and hr tags.

## Default Variables

```css
:root {
  --blue: #0076df;
  --dark-gray: #333;
  --light-gray: #ccc;
  --lighter-gray: #eee;
  --border-radius: 3px;
  --border-width: 1px;
  --border-color: var(--light-gray);
}
```
